data.actual_result: The context menu closes, but you're not taken into the server, requiring you to click it again
data.expected_result: The context menu should close and you're taken into the server
data.short_description: Context menus take priority over clicking into Servers/DMs
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a server and right-click on a user either in chat or from the Member List - While the context menu is still open, attempt to click into another server
